name: cosmichub
description: A comprehensive astrology and spiritual guidance platform with multi-system chart calculations

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:backend" "pnpm run dev:astro" "pnpm run dev:healwave"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:astro && pnpm run build:healwave
scripts.test: pnpm run test:astro && pnpm run test:healwave && pnpm run test:backend
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:astro && pnpm run lint:healwave && pnpm run lint:backend
scripts.format: pnpm run format:astro && pnpm run format:healwave && pnpm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && python -m black . && python -m isort .
scripts.type-check: pnpm run type-check:astro && pnpm run type-check:healwave
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd apps/astro && pnpm install && cd ../healwave && pnpm install && cd ../../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:astro && pnpm run clean:healwave && pnpm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf .pytest_cache
scripts.setup: pnpm run install:all && pnpm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Run pnpm run install:all to install all dependencies' && node ./scripts/sync-env.mjs

author: CosmicHub Team
